body.name: Andalou Naturals Blossom + Leaf Toning Refresher, 6 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 32 mins
features: Toning Refresher: Blossom and Leaf Toning Refresher uses resveratrol CoQ10 and aloe vera to help hydrate and replenish skin's nutrients; Help smooth and diminish fine lines for a youthful, ageless look

Inspired By Nature: This hydrating and toning skincare product addresses wrinkles with antioxidants for reparative and revitalizing support; Geranium and orange leaf help soothe irritated skin and balance pH levels
Ingredients From Nature: Andalou Naturals products are 98% nature-derived and vegetarian with a large vegan offering; Plus, we're gluten-free and cruelty-free—we never test on animals

Fruit Stem Cell Science: A blend of nature’s most potent bioactive stem cells from the Heirloom Apple, Grape, Swiss Alpine Rose, Argan Tree and Hemp Plant support skin protection, restoration and radiance
Ultimate Skincare: We believe you should never have to compromise ethics in favor of efficacy; Indulge in our range of toners, cleansers, lotions, masks, wrinkle creams, shampoos and deodorants
body.description: Organic aloe vera polysaccharides replenish vital moisture to hydrate, soothe and soften. Fruit stem cells and vitamin C effect countively slow cellular damage, stimulating circulation and healthy cell renewal, as uplifting geranium tones for a refreshed, beautifully balanced complexion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Apricot Probiotic Cleansing Milk Bioactive 8 Berry Fruit Enzyme Mask Blossom + Leaf Toning Refresher Fruit Stem Cell Revitalize Serum Ultra Sheer Daily Defense Facial Lotion SPF 18 Resveratrol Q10 Night Repair Cream Benefit Gently removes make-up and impurities, rinsing away dull surface cells and balancing skin flora. Gently dissolves and exfoliate dull, dry surface cells to reveal skin's natural glow and a youthful, rejuvenated complexion. Hydrates and replenishes with essential nutrients, gently soothing irritation and balancing skin's delicate pH. Supports dermal vitality for a more lifted, firmer, youthful looking appearance, and rejuvenated complexion. Boosts dermal vitality as lightweight hydration and ultra-sheer SPF 18 provide daily, easy to wear broad spectrum protection. Uplifts tone and texture overnight for velvety soft skin with the appearance of fewer fine lines and wrinkles and a rejuvenated complexion.

Key Ingredients Resveratrol Resveratrol Q10 super antioxidants support skin's wellbeing and youthful vitality. Goji Berry Goji Glycopeptides uplift for improved skin tone and texture. Aloe Vera Ultra hydrating Aloe Vera uplifts skin's protective moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, natural toner
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Cannacell Hydrating Toner for about six months and recently purchased more of the product through Amazon. For reference, I have somewhat oily skin and am not sensitive to skincare products apart from those containing benzoyl peroxide.I'm a huge fan of this toner! The smell may take some getting used to if you're not used to hemp products - it's somewhat grassy/earthy, but that is to be expected :) The smell does fade away as the toner dries. Usually I let the toner air dry after spritzing it on my face, which can take a few minutes. (I read a negative review that mentioned a defective spray mechanism, but I have not found that to be true with any of my purchases.)My skin feels much more refreshed and moisturized after having used this product for the last few months. I think that sometimes it can take time to see positive results in terms of skin healing/rejuvenation; but I will say that after six months my skin appears more much more even. I've gotten compliments about my complexion for the first time in my life, and I think this toner has a lot to do with that!I would recommend this toner to anyone who prefers using natural products and doesn't struggle with sensitive skin issues, as I'm honestly not sure how this toner will respond. Personally I am hooked on this product and plan on trying more from this line very soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! I have very dry/sensitive skin and I was worried my face would not react well to a new product but wow, my face has felt so smooth and feels very hydrated. It smells almost like fruit loops and my face has not had any issues. Very happy I decided to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing Feel with a Light Scent
reviews.reviewText: A must have for anyone looking to tone their skin. No need to make sure you have cotton balls or pads handy when you have Andalou's toner. Just spray it on! I like the light scent, although I don't think it smells too much like a blossom or a leaf. Whatever scent it is, it's nice and it feels ultra refreshing on my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing, not sticky like some are
reviews.reviewText: Easy to hold the bottle, sprays out in a nice, fine mist. Doesn't burn sensitive eyelids. Not sticky.No synthetic fragrance. Contains fabulous ingredients that combat the needs of a mature person's skin.Ingredients from Andalou website:Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside, Fruit Stem Cells (Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Resveratrol, Ubiquinone (CoQ10), Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Allantoin, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*†, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract*†, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*†, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium (Petitgrain) Flower Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Flower Oil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toner; wish it wasn't a spray nozzle
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toner. I love that it balances the PH in your skin and prepares you for the next steps in your beauty routine. I am 29 and have been struggling with highly sensitive, dehydrated yet oily skin and have been on a facial journey over the past 9 months. Everything I tried either hurt my face, made the problem worse, or was just "ok." The Aging line from Andalou Naturals has been a skin-saver! I returned the high-end Sephora products I was using after using this line for only a week. It has healed my skin. My skin is clearer, softer, happier, healthier, and "glowier." I will continue purchasing these products. You can't beat the careful ingredients or the price! My only "complaint" with this product is that I don't really like the spray nozzle. I originally started with the travel kit and really prefer that top and pouring this product onto a reusable facial cloth. I feel that it's more helpful in removing any traces of makeup residue and cleaning pores.My skin care routine is as follows: daytime - Probiotic Cleansing Milk (this product), Blossom+Leaf Toning Refresher, Gogi Peptide Cream, BB Cream. Nightime - (after removing makeup with Bliss Makeup Melt Cleanser) Probiotic Cleansing Milk (this product), Blossom+Leaf Toning Refresher, Turmeric+C Enlighten Serum, Resveratol Q10 Night Repair Cream.*all products Andalou Naturals, other than the Bliss Makeup Melt

reviews.reviewText: Love the Andalou brand all their products are top notch and work great

reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Pleasant scent. Hydrating

reviews.reviewText: This product is very refreshing, healthy, and compatible with my facial skin.
I have used this product for years and I love how it leaves my face feeling refreshed and hydrated. If anyone is hesitant, I highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Toning after cleansing & helps moisturiser sink in easier.

Excellent product, love the light scent! This opinion is from previous experience with this product as I still have not received this current order over a month after I made the purchase... supposedly coming in the next couple weeks

reviews.reviewTitle: Los ingredientes bien pero el olor y sensación jabonosa no.
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta que no tiene ningún ingrediente tóxico y los ingredientes antiedad que contiene (celulas madre, resveratrol, Q10...) con excepción del aceite de petitgrain, ya que al ser la flor de un cítrico puede ser fotosensibilizante y, teóricamente, manchar la piel., por eso evito usarlo si voy a estar mucho bajo el sol.Le pongo tres estrellas porque no me gusta que huele muy perfumado (los aceites esenciales supongo), que tiene una sensación jabonosa y que el chorro de agua sale muy fuerte contra la cara y te la empapa, no sale como brisa.Prefiero la crema de noche de la misma línea, tiene los mismos ingredientes (no tiene aceites fotosensibilizantes), casi no huele y se siente deliciosa, no deja sensación seca ni grasosa, es perfecta. Me costó 122 pesos mexicanos, gran rebaja.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2020
